markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Three Actions" /> Interact ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per week;   **Effect** You flip the hourglass sideways, pausing time for everyone but yourself. You cast [_time stop_](/Spells.aspx?ID=339).
name: Interact (divine, transmutation)
